SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
SET UP AND MAINTAIN NET ZERO CLOUD
Emissions Forecasts

Use emissions forecasting to generate accurate emissions forecasts and track your science-based targets. You can adjust the forecasts based on planned emissions savings initiatives.

Prepare to Set Up Emissions Forecasting
Accurately forecast your emissions with Advanced Account Forecasting to track your science-based targets.
Learn About Advanced Account Forecasting in Net Zero Cloud
Use the Advanced Account Forecasting component of Manufacturing Cloud to generate emissions forecasts in Net Zero Cloud. The basic configuration for emissions forecasting is available in the Sample Emissions Forecast Set.
Learn About Net Zero Cloud Data Processing Engine Templates
Net Zero Cloud provides Data Processing Engine templates to process high-volume calculations based on custom or standard objects. After you copy and activate the templates, run the Data Processing Engine jobs and track their execution by using Monitor Workflow Services.
Copy and Activate Net Zero Cloud Data Processing Engine Templates
Make copies of the available Net Zero Data Processing Engine job templates and activate them before running the jobs. You can't run the out-of-the-box data processing engine job templates because they aren’t active.
Set Up Forecast Periods
Edit the sample emissions forecast set period groups to modify the periods for which forecasts are generated.
Run Net Zero Cloud Data Processing Engine Definition
Run an active Data Processing Engine definition from the definition’s builder. When running a definition from the builder, you can provide input variable values that are used only for that run.
Automate Emissions Forecasts
Orchestrate a flow by using Flow Builder to automate calculation of emissions forecasts. Use flows to run the Calculate Emissions Forecasts data processing engine job to retrieve the actual emissions from annual emissions inventory and the target emissions from annual emissions reduction target for emissions activities, and calculate the emissions forecasts. Schedule the flow according to your requirements.

title: Setting Up Emissions Forecasts in Net Zero Cloud
